_AttachExtendedSealedFileEvidenceTextSim: The document was sealed with a keyless digital signature.
_AttachGuardtimeSealedFileEvidenceTextSi: The document was sealed with a digital signature.
_AttachSealedFileEvidenceTextSimpleNotAr: Scrive prepared the final PDF, including evidence collected by Scrive, before sealing with a digital signature.
_AutomaticReminderSentTextSimple: An automatic reminder to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$.
_CancelDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleArchive: The invitation to sign was withdrawn.
_CancelDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleNotArch: The invitation to sign was withdrawn by $actor$.
_CloseDocumentEvidenceTextSimple: Scrive locked the document from further modifications by the signing parties.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailTextToReviewS: The invitation to review was delivered to $signatory$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredByEmailTextToSignSim: The invitation to sign was delivered to $signatory$ by email.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSTextToReviewSim: The invitation to review was delivered to $signatory$ by SMS.
_InvitationDeliveredBySMSTextToSignSimpl: The invitation to sign was delivered to $signatory$ by SMS.
_InvitationEvidenceTextToReviewArchiveSi: An invitation to review  was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToReviewNotArchiv: An invitation to review was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ by Scrive. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToReview()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToSignArchiveSimp: An invitation to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign()$
_InvitationEvidenceTextToSignNotArchiveS: An invitation to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ by Scrive. $_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign()$
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailTextSimpleA: The invitation could not be delivered by email and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredByEmailTextSimpleN: The invitation to $signatory$ could not be delivered by email and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSTextSimpleArc: The invitation could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts were cancelled.
_InvitationUndeliveredBySMSTextSimpleNot: The invitation to $signatory$ could not be delivered by SMS and continued attempts were cancelled.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceTextToReviewS: The invitation to review (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_MarkInvitationReadEvidenceTextToSignSim: The invitation to sign (sent to $signatory_email$) was opened.
_PreparationToPendingEvidenceTextSimpleN: The preparation of the signing process settings was finished by $actor$. The signing process was initiated.
_ProlongDocumentEvidenceTextArchive: The due date for signing was prolonged.
_ProlongDocumentEvidenceTextNotArchive: The due date for signing was prolonged by $actor$.
_RejectDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleArchive:
The invitation to sign was rejected.$if(text)$ The rejection message was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_RejectDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleNotArch:
The invitation to sign was rejected by $actor$.$if(text)$ The rejection message from $actor$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ReminderSendTextToReviewArchive:
A reminder to review was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$.$if(text)$ The reminder message was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ReminderSendTextToReviewNotArchive:
A reminder to review was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$at the request of $actor$.$if(text)$ The reminder message from $actor$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ReminderSendTextToSignArchive:
A reminder to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$.$if(text)$ The reminder message was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_ReminderSendTextToSignNotArchive:
A reminder to sign was sent to $signatory$ using $_delivery_method()$ at the request of $actor$.$if(text)$ The reminder message from $actor$ was:
$text:noescape()$$endif$
_RestartDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleArchiv: The document was opened for editing.
_RestartDocumentEvidenceTextSimpleNotArc: The document was opened for editing by $actor$ in Scriveâ€™s interface to design signing processes.
_SMSPinDeliveredEvidenceText: The SMS with the PIN was delivered to $text$ for $signatory$ to use for identification.
_SMSPinSendEvidenceText: An SMS with a PIN was sent to $text$ for $signatory$ to use for identification.
_SignWithELegFailureEvidenceTextSimple: Scrive rejected the attempt by $signatory$ to sign the document. The reason was that the identity information of $signatory$ did not match the identity information received from the external eID system.
_SignatoryLinkVisitedTextNotArchiveSimpl: The document was opened by $actor$ online.
_TimeoutDocumentEvidenceTextSimple: The due date for signing the document passed.
_elegVerified:
The text signed in the eID client was: 

$infotext$

E-legitimation provider: $provider$.

$if(fieldsverified)$

Information about signatory verified by $provider$: $if(fstnameverified)$ First name; $endif$ $if(lstnameverified)$ Last name; $endif$ $if(persnumverified)$ Personal number; $endif$

$endif$

Signature:

$signature$

$if(certificate)$

Certificate:

$certificate$

$endif$ $if(ocsp)$

Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) Response:

$ocsp$

$endif$

$text:noescape()$$endif$$endif$
_invitationCustomMessageTextToSign:
$if(text)$$if(!mobile)$ The invitation to sign contained the following message:

_using_identification_method: $if(eleg)$ using eID as identification method$elseif(sms_pin)$ using PIN by SMS as identification method$endif$
